column2: Your client is a spirits company which makes vodka. Of late, they have experienced a decline in profits. Why is this happening? What recommendations can you give to turn this around?
column3:
Instructions for the case: 
1. Avoid referring to a problem as 'this issue'. Refer to your client as the client or as the drug lord and not 'we', 'the manufacturer', 'the company'. 
2. Ask your questions in precise and understandable English
